o.name: Tunesphere
o.tools: ReactJS, Spotify API, JavaScript, Python, Jupyter Notebook, Tensorflow, HTML, CSS
o.description: Song recommendation system that utilizes sentiment analysis to introduce new genres to listeners. Coded with two friends - won Best Design at HackTJ 10.0.

p.name: Knowledge Graph Generator
p.tools: Python, Jupyter Notebook, spaCy, Pandas, Matplotlib
p.description: Project done as part of research conducted under GMU's ASSIP program on automated ontological knowledge formation.

q.name: Othello Bot
q.description: An AI bot that uses minimax algorithms to play othello. Uses techniques such as alphabeta pruning and heuristics.

r.name: Lyric Finder
r.tools: ReactJS, JavaScript, HTML, Musixmatch API, Bootstrap
r.description: A react app that finds the lyrics of songs using the Musixmatch API. Includes a top ten tracks leaderboard and ratings of songs.

s.name: Sentiment Classifier
s.tools: Python, Jupyter Notebook, Pandas, Numpy, NLTK, SKLearn
s.description: A natural language processing model to find the sentiment (good or bad) of restaurant reviews.

u.name: Portfolio
u.description: A website made as a compilation of my experience, projects, and skills, hosted using my school's domain. You're looking at it right now.
